product_description: Eucerin Sun Clear Skin is an SPF 50 sunscreen lotion enriched with 5 antioxidants and oil-absorbing minerals for those with oily or acne-prone skin.(1) This Eucerin facial sunscreen SPF 50 features UVA/UVB sun protection plus an Advanced Antioxidant Complex, 5 AOX Shield, and goes beyond neutralizing to also guard from free radicals and help support skin health. It is also a non comedogenic sunscreen moisturizer, so it does not clog pores. Easy to apply, easily spreadable and easy to blend in, this moisturizing sunscreen for oily skin provides an immediate, long-lasting matte finish. Eucerin Sun Clear Skin Face Sunscreen SPF 50 is developed with dermatologists, hypoallergenic, and is free of fragrance, dyes, parabens, PABA, phthalates, oxybenzone and octinoxate. Eucerin Sun Clear Skin Face Sunscreen for acne prone skin also comes in a travel size sunscreen bottle with a unique, premium pump dispenser. Eucerin is a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand that is based on an uncompromising approach to science. (1)with continuous use. Use as directed with other Sun Protection Measures (See Drug Facts Box)

name: medicube No Cast Just Glow Collagen Sunscreen | SPF 50 Broad Spectrum Face Sunscreen | Lightweight, Non-Sticky, Hydrating Formula | Peptide, Cica for Soothing & Glow | Korean Skincare
short_description: [SPF 50, Made for Every Season] SPF 50 broad spectrum shields your skin from UVA/UVB rays year-round — not only in summer but also through cold, dry winter days. Keeps skin hydrated, smooth, and protected with soothing moisture — no white cast, no dryness, just glow.

[Sun care, Just as Important as Skincare] Infused with Collagen & Peptides for firm, radiant skin, Cica & Niacinamide to hydrate and soothe sun-exposed skin, and Hyaluronic Acid + Ceramide to help support the moisture barrier — delivering skincare-level care with SPF 50 protection.

[No White Cast, But a Glowy Finish] ] Lightweight moisturizing sunscreen that blends seamlessly into all skin tones with no white cast — no chalky or gray residue. Perfect for all skin tones and daily wear.

[Perfect Makeup or No Makeup] Non-greasy, and non-comedogenic formula absorbs quickly without clogging pores — doubles as a primer for a smooth, natural makeup base or delivers a healthy glow on bare skin.

[Lightweight Yet Instant Hydration Boost] Soft, non-sticky formula enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramide, delivering +61% increase in hydration with just one use* while maintaining a fresh, breathable texture. *Clinical Trial Tested by the 'Global Dermatological Research Institute.' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.

name: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion SPF 70, Broad Spectrum, Water Resistant 80 Min, Oil-Free, Oxybenzone-Free, Non-Comedogenic, Matte Finish, Body Sunscreen, Travel Size 3 Fl Oz
short_description: SPF 70 broad spectrum sunscreen lotion delivers high UVA/UVB protection for daily use; water resistant for up to 80 minutes to help guard skin during outdoor activities. Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure and reapply as directed.

Lightweight, oil-free, non-comedogenic Dry-Touch formula absorbs quickly for most users, leaving an ultra-light feel. Finish may vary; some may notice a slight sheen or visible white cast, especially on medium to dark skin tones.

Oxybenzone-free, Hawaii Act 104 compliant, PABA-free body sunscreen; powered by Helioplex technology to provide stable protection against aging UVA and burning UVB rays while helping defend skin from environmental stressors.

Convenient 3 fl oz travel size is TSA compliant and easy to pack in carry-ons, gym bags, or backpacks; a portable sunscreen lotion for on-the-go protection at the beach, park, or commute without weighing down your routine.

Trusted by dermatologists, this formula includes antioxidant Vitamin E for added defense. For best results, reapply at least every 2 hours and after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating; a minority may experience irritation—patch test if unsure.
product_description: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion SPF 70 is a high-performance body sunscreen lotion designed for powerful, broad spectrum sun protection on the go. Formulated with advanced Helioplex technology, this lightweight, oil-free sunscreen helps shield your skin from both aging UVA and burning UVB rays. Key Benefits: - Broad spectrum SPF 70 sunscreen lotion for daily and outdoor use - Lightweight, dry-touch formula absorbs quickly for a comfortable, non-greasy feel - Water resistant sunscreen (up to 80 minutes) for sports, travel, and outdoor activities - Oxybenzone-free and Hawaii Act 104 compliant - Oil-free, non-comedogenic, and PABA-free—won't clog pores or leave a heavy residue - TSA-approved travel size sunscreen (3 fl oz) that fits easily in bags and carry-ons - Enriched with antioxidant Vitamin E to help defend against environmental stressors - from a dermatologist recommended brand, this body sunscreen is for reliable everyday protection. Use For: - Daily sun protection for body - Outdoor activities: hiking, gardening, biking, boating, beach days, and more - Travel and on-the-go sun care, including commutes and weekend trips Technical Details: - Broad spectrum SPF 70 (UVA/UVB protection) - Helioplex technology for stabilized sun protection - Water resistant (up to 80 minutes) - Oilfree, non-comedogenic, PABA-free, oxybenzone-free - Dermatologist recommended brand - TSAapproved 3 fl oz travel size Important Note: Some users, especially those with medium to dark skin tones, may notice a white cast or slight sheen. For best results, apply evenly and reapply after swimming or sweating. A mild scent may be present but typically fades quickly. If product separates, shake well before use. Disclaimer: Not a mineral sunscreen. For external use only. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

short_description: Pack of One, 3-fluid ounce Neutrogena Clear Face Sunscreen for Acne-Prone Skin Stabilized with Helioplex technology, this oxybenzone-free facial sunscreen offers superior Broad Spectrum SPF 50 UVA/UVB protection

Lightweight, Matte Sunscreen Lotion. Neutrogena's daily face SPF, recommended by dermatologists, features a water-light texture that leaves a weightless, matte finish, allowing skin to breathe without causing breakouts

Ideal Sunscreen for Oily Skin and Acne-Prone Skin, this lightweight, oil-free, and fragrance-free face sunscreen is perfect for on-the-go protection. Its convenient travel-size bottle fits easily in your purse or backpack

Water-Resistant Sunscreen: This liquid sunscreen for face is water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, ensuring your skin stays protected during outdoor activities like hiking, biking, boating, gardening, or walking

Neutrogena Clear Face Sunscreen SPF 50, Formulated to prevent sunburns without causing breakouts, Neutrogena sunscreen decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging when used as directed with other sun protection measures
product_description: Neutrogena Clear Face Sunscreen Lotion for Acne-Prone Skin is a lightweight, oil-free, fragrance-free, and oxybenzone-free sunscreen for face that delivers Broad Spectrum SPF 50 protection with Helioplex Technology, making it an ideal face sunscreen for oily and acne-prone skin. This dermatologist-tested facial sunscreen provides a water-light, matte finish that won’t cause breakouts and is non-greasy, supporting clear, healthy-looking skin every day. The 3 fl. oz. travel size sunscreen is perfect for daily use and on-the-go protection, fitting easily into your purse or backpack for convenient reapplication. Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes, this face sunscreen helps protect against both UVA and UVB rays during outdoor activities such as gardening, hiking, and biking, so you can enjoy time outside with confidence. The advanced Helioplex Technology ensures stable and effective broad spectrum sunscreen defense, while the oil-free and fragrance-free formula is designed to minimize the risk of irritation and breakouts, making it suitable for sensitive, oily, and acne-prone skin types. Regular use of this oil free face sunscreen, as directed with other sun protection measures, can help decrease the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by sun exposure. Neutrogena Clear Face Sunscreen is recommended for anyone seeking a travel size sunscreen that offers reliable, broad spectrum SPF 50 protection without clogging pores or leaving a greasy residue. Choose this dermatologist-tested sunscreen lotion for face to keep your skin protected, comfortable, and looking its best every day, whether at home or on the go.
